description.narrative: IR 2.2 by end 2012 at least 95% of the caregivers especially in 28 high priority districts in 4 priority provinces understand that the threat of Polio is preventable through Polio vaccination, which contributes to Immunization, Polio Eradication. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 2: Child and Maternal Mortality are reduced through more equitable access to quality health, nutrition and Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) interventions

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
